function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through contact with contaminated surfaces in the built environment.","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of diseases within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection and cleaning of surfaces, as well as promoting hand hygiene.","Technologies":"Use of antimicrobial materials and self-disinfecting surfaces in building infrastructure.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and cleaning staff."},{"Description":"Overcrowding in indoor spaces leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of person-to-person transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implementing occupancy limits, improving ventilation, and using zoning strategies to reduce crowding.","Technologies":"Smart building sensors for monitoring occupancy levels and air quality, as well as digital signage for crowd management.","People":"Building occupants, event organizers, and facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, event organizers, and facility management."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air exchange in enclosed spaces.","Impact":"Accumulation of airborne contaminants and reduced dilution of pathogens in the air.","Mitigation":"Installation of air purification systems, regular maintenance of HVAC systems, and use of natural ventilation where feasible.","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI), and air quality monitoring sensors.","People":"Building occupants, HVAC technicians, and air quality experts.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, and HVAC service providers."}]}
